code: import{useEffect,useState}from"react";import Todo from"./components/Todo";import{addToDo,getAllTodo,updateTodo,deleteToDo}from"./utils/HandleApi";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[toDo,setToDo]=useState([]);const[text,setText]=useState("");const[isUpdated,setIsUpdated]=useState(false);const[toDoId,setToDoId]=useState("");useEffect(()=>{getAllTodo(setToDo);},[]);const updateMode=(_id,text)=>{setIsUpdated(true);setText(text);setToDoId(_id);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"App",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"My ToDo App \u2764\uFE0F"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"top",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Add ToDo...",value:text,onChange:e=>setText(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"add",onClick:isUpdated?()=>updateTodo(toDoId,text,setToDo,setText,setIsUpdated):()=>addToDo(text,setText,setToDo),children:isUpdated?"Updated":"Add"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"list",children:toDo.map(item=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Todo,{text:item.text,updateMode:()=>updateMode(item._id,item.text),deleteToDo:()=>deleteToDo(item._id,setToDo)},item._id))})]})});}export default App;
